description:
Mashiro spends an evening with Azuha and Maki. Later, Nagumo and Asunaro switch partners.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Mashiro Hosts Girls` Night Out / Assistant Switch!! / Battle to the Death at 100 Celsius
Mashiro, Joshikai o Hiraku / Joshu Koutai!! / Sesshi 100 C no Shitou
真白, 女子会を開く / 助手交代!! / 摂氏100℃の死闘
